name: Molecular Future
description: Molecular Future is an innovative financial investment service company registered in the a one-stop digital asset investment service platform jointly funded by Molecular Group, HBCC, XBTING Fund, HCASH Foundation and Collistar Capital. We will provide the majority of users with the Blockchain -related investment products, institutional-level market trading software, media information, project archives and community service systems, and correctly guide the users into the chain and digital asset investment field, etc.
